And the LORD<S>3068</S> spake<S>1696</S> unto Moses<S>4872</S>, saying<S>559</S>,
Speak<S>1696</S> unto the children<S>1121</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>, saying<S>559</S>, If a woman<S>802</S> have conceived seed<S>2232</S>, and born<S>3205</S> a man child<S>2145</S>: then she shall be unclean<S>2930</S> seven<S>7651</S> days<S>3117</S>; according to the days<S>3117</S> of the separation<S>5079</S> for her infirmity<S>1738</S> shall she be unclean<S>2930</S>.
And in the eighth<S>8066</S> day<S>3117</S> the flesh<S>1320</S> of his foreskin<S>6190</S> shall be circumcised<S>4135</S>.
And she shall then continue<S>3427</S> in the blood<S>1818</S> of her purifying<S>2893</S> three<S>7969</S> and thirty<S>7970</S> days<S>3117</S>; she shall touch<S>5060</S> no hallowed<S>6944</S> thing, nor come<S>935</S> into the sanctuary<S>4720</S>, until the days<S>3117</S> <S>3117</S> of her purifying<S>2892</S> be fulfilled<S>4390</S>.
But if she bear<S>3205</S> a maid child<S>5347</S>, then she shall be unclean<S>2930</S> two weeks<S>7620</S>, as in her separation<S>5079</S>: and she shall continue<S>3427</S> in the blood<S>1818</S> of her purifying<S>2893</S> threescore<S>8346</S> and six<S>8337</S> days<S>3117</S>.
And when the days<S>3117</S> of her purifying<S>2892</S> are fulfilled<S>4390</S>, for a son<S>1121</S>, or for a daughter<S>1323</S>, she shall bring<S>935</S> a lamb<S>3532</S> of the first<S>1121</S> year<S>8141</S> for a burnt offering<S>5930</S>, and a young<S>1121</S> pigeon<S>3123</S>, or a turtledove<S>8449</S>, for a sin offering<S>2403</S>, unto the door<S>6607</S> of the tabernacle<S>168</S> of the congregation<S>4150</S>, unto the priest<S>3548</S>: <sup>of the first: Heb. a son of his year</sup>
Who shall offer<S>7126</S> it before<S>6440</S> the LORD<S>3068</S>, and make an atonement<S>3722</S> for her; and she shall be cleansed<S>2891</S> from the issue<S>4726</S> of her blood<S>1818</S>. This is the law<S>8451</S> for her that hath born<S>3205</S> a male<S>2145</S> or a female<S>5347</S>.
And if she be not able to bring<S>4672</S> <S>1767</S> <S>3027</S> a lamb<S>7716</S>, then she shall bring<S>3947</S> two<S>8147</S> turtles<S>8449</S>, or two young<S>1121</S> pigeons<S>3123</S>; the one<S>259</S> for the burnt offering<S>5930</S>, and the other<S>259</S> for a sin offering<S>2403</S>: and the priest<S>3548</S> shall make an atonement<S>3722</S> for her, and she shall be clean<S>2891</S>. <sup>she be: Heb. her hand find not sufficiency of</sup>
